Key Match Events: France defeated Belgium 1-0 in the Euro 2024 match
Jan Vertonghen scored an own goal for France in the 85th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps, the French coach, was pleased with the team's victory
Belgium will be disappointed with their performance and the result
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was described as dour and lacking creativity
Others: The goal was a result of a deflection off Jan Vertonghen's knee
